biotools.summary: Simulation methods for the evolution of antibody repertoires. The heavy and light chain variable region of both human and C57BL/6 mice can be simulated in a time-dependent fashion. Both single lineages using one set of V-, D-, and J-genes or full repertoires can be simulated.

bioschemas.name: AbSim
bioschemas.summary: Simulation methods for the evolution of antibody repertoires. The heavy and light chain variable region of both human and C57BL/6 mice can be simulated in a time-dependent fashion. Both single lineages using one set of V-, D-, and J-genes or full repertoires can be simulated.
